name: Incapacitants
description: {{Nihongo|'''Incapacitants'''|インキャパシタンツ|Inkyapashitantsu}} are a [[Japan]]ese [[noise music]] group formed in 1981. Initially a solo project of Toshiji Mikawa, Fumio Kosakai joined upon the project's relocation to [[Tokyo]]. The duo's stated aim is to produce "pure" noise, uninfluenced by musical ideas or even human intention, using primarily [[Audio feedback|feedback]], vocals, and various [[electronics]]. Kosakai calls this sound "hard noise", as a nod to the jazz subgenre [[hard bop]].
